Name: Gangster Vegas Crime - Open Wo
Description:
Gangster Vegas Crime - Open World Game is great crime simulator game in which you can do many task and earn cash to unlock more advance weapons and ammo.The game play involves different shooting and killing plots, where you can kill criminals and mafia persons.A lot of interesting criminal missions are available in game, Enthralling game play: car theft and murder ordinary citizens! 
Features:
- Lots of ammunition and weapons 
- Amazing game play with lots of different hotspots of gangsters in Vegas!
- Many vehicles to drive
- Street shooting
- Destroyable objects
- Dynamic game play

Name: Ganster - Mafia War 2018
Description:
Extreme gang wars bring again and challenging world missions back to your cell devices. It is completely a wonderful third-person shooter mobile game with great and nice graphics and good gameplay. It’s a battle between city mafias and grand mafia lord.In this game become the leader gangster in the sin city of san andreas and complete your own mission by killing the all other gangs in this simulator game.Survive the people and take out the celebrities in this gangster war shooting field so that you become a grand gangster of this mission.
Features

• Unique shooting and nice racing
• Nice 3d Graphics with good controls
• Amazing third-person shooting
• Very nice use of guns to make top position
• Auto stealing and police firefighting
• Realistic physics And auto theft
